name.ja: <ruby>罪<rt>ざい</rt></ruby><ruby>宝<rt>ほう</rt></ruby><ruby>合<rt>がっ</rt></ruby><ruby>戦<rt>せん</rt></ruby>

text.en: Target cards you control up to the number of your "Sinful Spoils" cards that are banished and/or in your GY, and/or cards your opponent controls up to the number of their "Sinful Spoils" cards that are banished and/or in their GY; destroy them. If this Set card is destroyed, or banished, by an opponent's activated effect: You can shuffle up to 2 cards on the field into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "Battle of the Sinful Spoils" per turn.
